attributes.title: hated this
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to stay informed on my president and it keeps shutting down my phone. Whenever I signed into the app there was this orange baboon and I was really confused why I was there. If I could, I would give this negative stars.

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I’m very disappointed with this app. I first searched for “The Official Racist app” and this came up. So I decided to install and after 20 minutes of surfing the app I realized you don’t get to talk to the racist president Donald, you just get his propaganda 😩

attributes.title: I don’t know why it doesn’t work lol
attributes.review: So I downloaded it, except when I went to open it, it says this device cannot support this app. Well, I’m glad my phone is smart enough to not support a bootleg Garfield.

attributes.title: I think y’all know why I rated it this way🙃
attributes.review: It’s kind of scary to open the app and see a large 🍊 on my screen. And he thinks he’s gonna cancel Gen Z well he has another thing coming. I hope y’all have a nice day. You too Donald 😘

attributes.title: no aesthetic 🤢🤢🤢
attributes.review: the app interface is SO UGLY. makes me projectile vomit every time i try to use the apps many gross features. also, i think this app should be in the “games” category of the app store because we finna play donald j trump like the raggedy puppet he is.

attributes.title: This made my phone crash
attributes.review: The app took way too long to finish and once it did I couldn’t use it because my phone would crash also tik tok should stay

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review:
Water. Earth. Fire. Air. 

Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony. Then everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked. 

Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them. But when the world needed him most, he vanished. 

A hundred years passed and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar, an airbender named Aang, and although his airbending skills are great, he still has a lot to learn before he's ready to save anyone. 

But I believe Aang can save the world.

attributes.title: ✨🧚🏼 the cheeto
attributes.review: i thought he ran great businesses but apparently that doesn’t translate to apps 10/10 DONT RECOMMEND✨. It makes your phone crash. Maybe instead of becoming the president again he should learn how to use apps 🥰💗

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This app doesn’t have cool features that you think might be here. It glitches and there isn’t much to it. As everyone may know 2020 didnt start a great year. I personally think he is going to continue to make America WORSE. 🤍🧚🏻💗⭐️

attributes.title: do you even care anymore?
attributes.review: i don’t know whats worse, this app or trumps email list, both feel so insincere. i want to know daddy trump actually cares about me but it seems like im not even special to him anymore. everybody gets the same messages its like why bother.  ive always been thwre for you but youve never been there for me. all im asking is please just notice me trump 🥺🥺🥺 im technically not even 18 but nobody has to know 😉😉😉😉 its just that i love you trump 🥵
